md:
giải nghĩa từ "wishes" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Wishes (noun) - Ước muốn, mong ước
	+ Example: "I have many wishes for my birthday."
	+ Related words: hope, desire, aspiration
	+ Antonyms: fears, doubts

* Wish (verb) - Ước, mong
	+ Example: "I wish you a happy birthday."
	+ Related words: hope, desire, pray
	+ Antonyms: dread, fear

* Wish (interjection) - Ước (dùng để chúc mừng hay chúc may mắn)
	+ Example: "Wish you were here!"
	+ Related words: congratulations, good luck
	+ Antonyms: none

Note: Depending on the context, "wishes" can also be used as a plural noun to refer to multiple expressions of good will or congratulation, such as "best wishes" or "season's wishes".

  • Wishes (noun) - Ước muốn, mong ước

    • Antonyms: fears, doubts

  • Wish (verb) - Ước, mong

    • Antonyms: dread, fear

Note: Depending on the context, "wishes" can also be used as a plural noun to refer to multiple expressions of good will or congratulation, such as "best wishes" or "season's wishes".
